name: Dr.Green
description: Dr.Green is a 2D retro, arcade, action platformer, inspired by games like Megaman and Ninja Senki. Take control of the orphan Dr.Green, on his mission to save the forest and take revenge on the evil forces trying to destroy it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.2Ghz+ Storage: 101.9 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Like Mega Man? You will enjoy this game very much. Felt like i was playing on my SNES. Good old school progression, adding harder platforming and enemies each level. For me it fell into that perfect zone of 'not to easy, but not to hard'   Check out the first level of the game here.          YouTubeâ„¢ Video:  Dr.Green. First Look
